title: What the Critérium du Dauphiné might tell us about the Tour de France
content:
From the sprinters that might derail Cavendish, to the form of Vingegaard, Bernal, Alaphilippe: The Dauphiné should deliver some pre-Tour clues.

Read the full article at What the Critérium du Dauphiné might tell us about the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
